name: oauth-authorizations_revoke-authorization-for-application
description: OAuth application owners can revoke a single token for an OAuth application. You must use [Basic Authentication](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@2.19/rest/overview/other-authentication-methods#basic-authentication) for this method, where the username is the OAuth application `client_id` and the password is its `client_secret`.

client_id.description: The client ID of your GitHub app.
